item.title: Patching vmware for 2.6.24
item.description: So as I previously said I have updated to Hardy Haron and along with it comes a new kernel that does not work out of the box with vmware. You need to patch your vmnet and vmmon sources to get it working again. So I went ahead and wrote a script to make the process a bit faster.

item.title: SyntaxHighlighter Plus Patch
item.description: Disclaimer: I did not write the bash support for syntaxhighlighter bboy.mr.freeze did and it can also be found here . All I did was take that, and modify SyntaxHighlighter Plus to take advantage of it.
